columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the OIDC provider resource.

columns.name: client_id_list
columns.description: A list of client IDs (also known as audiences) that are associated with the specified IAM OIDC provider resource object.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time when the IAM OIDC provider resource object was created in the Amazon Web Services account.

columns.name: thumbprint_list
columns.description: A list of certificate thumbprints that are associated with the specified IAM OIDC provider resource object.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The URL that the IAM OIDC provider resource object is associated with.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the specified IAM OIDC provider.
